org.apache.cassandra.io

Class ForwardingVersionedSerializer<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.cassandra.io.ForwardingVersionedSerializer<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IVersionedSerializer<T>

    public abstract class ForwardingVersionedSerializer<T>
extends java.lang.Object
implements IVersionedSerializer<T>
    A serializer which forwards all its method calls to another serializer. Subclasses should override one or more methods to modify the behavior of the backing serializer as desired per the decorator pattern.
